data.message: Shame you forget your lines to one of your most iconic song the other night tut tut tut

replies.message: Dont hate. It prives he sings live. Shut peps up in that front 😜
Laughable
Which song did he forget?
Stan lolol

Shut your mouth adam he had over 600 songs in the head,and the line with uncle ronny is so emotional for marshall.rap is his life you are not a stan,stupid idiot put you in the top ten a.k.a half men.shame on you

He is a human he makes mistakes..with all those lyrics in his head he could just play the recorded song and not even talk ..but he tries..and he made only 1 fucking mistake and you notice this little thing and not the overall live

I was there the other night, he was bloody amazing!
Dave if you weren't there I suggest you stfu.  I was there and he absolutely smashed it 😊
really? He had them stop and run the music over. It's happened how many times in his long career? C'mon stop it.
Pretty sure he's not gona lose a single minutes sleep over it or a single true fan either tbh
Artists slip up in live performances. Comedians forget routines or jokes. It happens. Remember Stan was written about 17 years ago. He's compiled how many songs since then?

Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, (lucky for us), there was a guy named Adam Loman. He used to queue little peas next to his dick to measure it. With the years passing by and the number of peas in the  line never growing more then four peas, suddenly, on a sunny day he became revolted. He decided then to dedicate his life to hunt every and any flaws on anyone who were more blessed then him, so he could diss one, and feel a little better about his shitty self. The most happy day in Adam´s life was when he saw  the King of awesomeness, God of Rap and Major Sir of big dickness, not to be perfect as usual, for a few seconds!! Adam Loman´s eyes filled with tears, he gave the largest smile of his life filled with euphoria and got back to the pea bag, cause he was sure that he could add at least two more. But not, off course, before he goes to this Rap God´s page and make fun of him. Even with no actual reason to do it.. but Adam was special, and never nedded a reason to be an asshole in his life. So as soon as he finished his mocking, he got back to his room and with tears in his eyes again, but not happy tears this time, he noticed that his dick still didnt passed a four pea line. He found himself confused and couldnt understand: that trying to decrease the great ones, does not make him any better! When will Adam Loman get it? Lets wait and see, lets cheer for Adam to grow  up and be a man. Maybe, one day, when his dick beggins to shrink even more, he will try to make good use of his brain for the first time in his life and even maybe, just maybe, he gift us all with his silence, wich is the only good thing he has to give. That´s all folks.
Shame on you ,commenting nonsense here ,bieber fan
